title: How to Microwave a Peep

steps.headline: Buy Peeps.
steps.description: They are usually found in the candy aisle of a supermarket or drugstore, particularly during Easter and other holiday seasons (Halloween, Christmas, Valentine's Day etc. ).

steps.headline: Put the Peeps on a plate.
steps.description: Make sure that you use a large enough plate. The peeps will expand to the size of a softball when microwaved.

steps.headline: Put the plate in the microwave.
Set the timer from 30 to 60 seconds.
steps.description: Note that the Peeps will deflate after removing.

steps.headline: Stop the microwave and open the door.
Take them out.
steps.description: Get some graham crackers and some Easter chocolate for a colorful Easter S’more.

text: Buy Peeps. They are usually found in the candy aisle of a supermarket or drugstore, particularly during Easter and other holiday seasons (Halloween, Christmas, Valentine's Day etc. ). Put the Peeps on a plate. Make sure that you use a large enough plate. The peeps will expand to the size of a softball when microwaved. Open the microwave door.  Put the plate in the microwave.  Close the door.  Set the timer from 30 to 60 seconds. Note that the Peeps will deflate after removing. Start the microwave.  Watch the Peeps.  Stop the microwave and open the door.  Take them out. Get some graham crackers and some Easter chocolate for a colorful Easter S’more.
